data.subject: Into The Ashes
data.lyric:
You call from the shadows
 And curse my blood in the wind
 You speak in riddles
 The substance which

data.subject: A Thousand Suns
data.lyric:
Those treasured wisdoms were forgotten over time
 Holds a message stolen from the stars where we liv

data.subject: Acolytes
data.lyric:
The kingdom of heaven is foundering
 A foulness to the race of man
 Where they worship in the lands

data.subject: The World Beyond
data.lyric:
Dwells no man into this infinity
 For as the last glow of the sun sets

data.subject: Capisce A Me
data.lyric:
s scet o rion chianu chian ma
 sott a chistu sol nunz po chiu sta
 a jurnat e long nun c fa respira,

data.subject: Overo
data.lyric:
Pasqua ma nun me vire
 Stong miez a via
 Accat chiu robb cu na mill lir
 Ce sentimm over
 Stamm miez

data.subject: Sta Chiuvenne Ancora
data.lyric:
E stasera sto perz
 E stasera nun veng
 Voglio sta sul cu mme
 Na vot sul cu mme
 E me guard e po pe

data.subject: So Sempe Chille
data.lyric:
O tiemp va 'e nun se fa pava
 Nun te fa senti, nun te fa ricorda
 Io resto cca, chi c sta ce sta
 A

data.subject: Ammore Senza Core
data.lyric:
Tu me lassato sul in ta stu munn nir
 In ta sta solitudine che a poc a poc accir
 Te pens acnor, cu

data.subject: Primmavera
data.lyric:
Primmavera
 Se sente addore 'e mar
 Rint 'e suonn 'e chi nun part mai
 Pij 'o sol 'a copp 'o sest pi
